General.Name: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Asia Biomass Public Company Limited, through its subsidiaries, engages in the procurement and trading of biomass fuel in Thailand and internationally. The company also manufactures wood chips and biomass pellets. In addition, it provides logistics and transportation services; distributes agricultural and related products; and real estate collateral loan services. The company was formerly known as Thai Joss Powder Industrial Co., Ltd and changed its to Asia Biomass Public Company Limited. Asia Biomass Public Company Limited was founded in 1984 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

0.Name: Ms. Tiyada  Mekpongsatorn
